long_description: The women's Osprey Sirrus 24 Pack offers a customized fit and impressive ventilation for all-day comfort on day hikes and peak-bagging attempts. Women-specific harness and hipbelt provide a dialed-in fit. Stretch-mesh back panel allows warm, moist air to escape. Panel-loading main compartment makes your gear easy to access. Internal sleeve with central exit port and stretch webbing on the shoulder strap holds a hydration reservoir (sold separately). 2 side mesh pockets and zippered hipbelt pockets. Stow-on-the-Go(TM) system lets you attach trekking poles or an ice axe. Integrated raincover helps keep contents dry and stashes in its own pocket. The women's Osprey Sirrus 24 Pack is made of durable nylon in eye-pleasing colors and graphics. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Osprey Sirrus 24 Pack offers a customized fit and impressive ventilation for all-day comfort on day hikes and peak-bagging attempts.
